snippet: Even before the second season airs, Netflix has agreed to another 13 shows for the series about a scheming congressman, played by Kevin Spacey.
abstract: Netflix agrees to third season of 13 episodes for its web streaming series House of Cards; completes deal even before its second season has become available to viewers.
lead_paragraph: Even before the second season airs, Netflix has agreed to another 13 shows for the series about a scheming congressman, played by Kevin Spacey.

headline.main: Netflix Signs for a Third Season of ‘House of Cards’
headline.print_headline: Netflix Plans 3rd Season of ‘House of Cards’
